content: TE-Y SP Clay spade chisels Extra-sharp SDS Max (TE-Y) clay spade chisel bit for digging and loosening terrain using power tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specially designed, high-performance rounded clay spade – sharpened edge for faster penetration of clay, hard-packed gravel and dirt Upgraded earth piercing power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the spade Better reliability – these spade bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our clay spades are made to power through your most demanding earthworks and ground preparation tasks Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Digging into clay, hard-packed gravel or dirt For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Application: Earth work Length: 485 Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Application | Earth work | Length | 485 | Width | 115 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429817 - Clay spade chisel TE-Y SP 50 - Package Size 1 pc - 382278 - Clay spade TE-YX SP 50 - Package Size 1 pc
